name: AWS Storage Gateway Cached Volume
short: A hybrid storage service that provides on-premises applications with low-latency access to virtually unlimited cloud storage through caching data locally.
description: AWS Storage Gateway Cached Volume is a hybrid storage service that provides on-premises applications with low-latency access to data. It stores frequently accessed data locally in a cache for quick access while storing the complete data set in Amazon S3. This service is ideal for read-intensive workloads and scenarios where latency is crucial. It integrates well with AWS Backup for data protection and AWS CloudWatch for monitoring, offering a seamless and efficient storage solution.
